title: 求助！木牌指令插件
author: sjy1359

replies.author: erry64
replies.txt_content:
建议使用scriptblock:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ghlight=scriptblock
安装之后给玩家权限:
scriptblock.interact.use
scriptblock.walk.use
然后输入指令
/sbinteract create @bypass /manuadd <player> [组]
之后右键牌子

 求最佳答案

replies.author: Hero_rix
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-76134-1-1.html，这里有scriptblock的更完整的指令及介绍，求最佳
